segments.text: I'm taking my date to a restaurant . Could you tell me about one or two good ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure ! How much would you like to spend on your date ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She will want an excellent restaurant , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should know that our hotel chef was trained in Paris . The service and food are world-class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted to go out somewhere , not stay here . Do you know of another good restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can't go wrong with Gramercy Tavern . It's famous for its food , service , and live jazz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like that ! Could you please call them to see if we can get in tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At once , sir . You'll love this place , I assure you .
segments.speaker: S2
